mapper.select: SELECT USERPHOTOSEQ, USEREMAIL, TITLE, CONTENTS, SAVEFILENAME, ORIGINALFILENAME, WRITEDATE, HITCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, COCKTAILNAME FROM USERPHOTO WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail} ORDER BY WRITEDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERPHOTO WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail}

SELECT p.USERPHOTOSEQ, p.USEREMAIL, p.TITLE, p.CONTENTS, p.SAVEFILENAME, p.ORIGINALFILENAME, p.WRITEDATE, p.HITCOUNT, p.LIKECOUNT, p.COCKTAILNAME, c.IMAGERINK FROM USERPHOTO p, cocktail2 c WHERE p.cocktailname = c.cocktailname ORDER BY p.WRITEDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERFOLLOW WHERE USEREMAIL = '${userEmail}'
SELECT USEREMAIL, TOUSEREMAIL, MESSAGE FROM DIRECTMESSAGE WHERE (USEREMAIL = #{userEmail} AND TOUSEREMAIL = #{toUserEmail}) OR (USEREMAIL = #{toUserEmail} AND TOUSEREMAIL = #{userEmail})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIRECTMESSAGE ( USEREMAIL, TOUSEREMAIL, MESSAGE ) VALUES( #{userEmail}, #{toUserEmail}, #{message} )
mapper.select: select * from userdetail where useremail in ( SELECT uf.followuser FROM USERDETAIL ud, USERFOLLOW uf WHERE ud.USEREMAIL = uf.USEREMAIL AND ud.USEREMAIL = #{value} )
select * from userdetail where useremail in ( SELECT uf.useremail FROM USERDETAIL ud, USERFOLLOW uf WHERE ud.USEREMAIL = uf.followuser AND uf.followuser = #{value} )

SELECT USERPHOTOSEQ, USEREMAIL, TITLE, CONTENTS, SAVEFILENAME, ORIGINALFILENAME, WRITEDATE, HITCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, COCKTAILNAME FROM ( SELECT USERPHOTOSEQ, USEREMAIL, TITLE, CONTENTS, SAVEFILENAME, ORIGINALFILENAME, WRITEDATE, HITCOUNT, LIKECOUNT, COCKTAILNAME FROM USERPHOTO ORDER BY LIKECOUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT USEREMAIL, USERCOCKTAILSEQ FROM USERLIKECOCKTAIL WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail} AND USERCOCKTAILSEQ = #{userCocktailSeq}

SELECT c.cocktail_Seq, c.cocktailName, c.cocktailName_EN, c.ingredient, c.recipe, c.imageRink, c.colorValue, c.recommand, c.hitcount FROM USERLIKECOCKTAIL u, Cocktail2 c WHERE u.USERCOCKTAILSEQ = c.cocktail_Seq AND u.USEREMAIL = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERDETAIL SET ORIGINALFILENAME = #{originalFilename}, SAVEDFILENAME = #{savedFilename} WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERFOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWUSER = '${userEmail}'
SELECT USEREMAIL, FOLLOWUSER FROM USERFOLLOW WHERE USEREMAIL = #{userEmail} AND FOLLOWUSER = #{followUser}

SELECT u.userPhotoSeq, u.userEmail, u.title, u.contents, u.saveFileName, u.originalFileName, u.writeDate, u.hitcount, u.likecount, u.cocktailName FROM USERPHOTOLIKE p, USERPHOTO u WHERE p.USERPHOTOSEQ = u.USERPHOTOSEQ AND p.USEREMAIL = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERDETAIL SET USERNICKNAME=#{userNickname}, USERINSTA=#{userInsta} where USEREMAIL= #{userEmail}
